title: Arabic typewriter face
content:
I am having difficulties knowing the type of a font that i attached to you.  
so if you please help me to recognize the font as soon as you can, and where i can find it  
(arabic language by the way) I think it was written by Typewriter.

thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140726001800im_/http:/typophile.com/files/222_5552.jpg)
author: abomlyana

comments.content:
i have been told that this forum full of experts  
eager to show off their amazing identifying skills!  
so i hope to find what i need here\>\>

Typewriter fonts rarely have a direct match in the digital (or metal!) font world, not least because they had to be absolutely as simple as possible.

You might look at the old Linotype Arabic fonts to find something close.

hhp
thanks for reply . where i can find linotype arabic fonts pls (url)
The Arabic in the image is in a monospace type, FYI.
